import{API_URL}from'../constants/constants';import axios from'axios';export var getAllCategory=function getAllCategory(){return axios({method:'GET',url:"".concat(API_URL,"/api/category")});};export var getOneCategoryByCode=function getOneCategoryByCode(code){return axios({method:'GET',url:"".concat(API_URL,"/api/category/get?code=").concat(code)});};export var getAllsubCategory=function getAllsubCategory(){return axios({method:'GET',url:"".concat(API_URL,"/api/subcategory")});};// get ds thuong hieu theo danh muc
export var getAllBrandByCategoryCode=function getAllBrandByCategoryCode(category){return axios({method:'GET',url:"".concat(API_URL,"/api/brand/category?category=").concat(category)});};
